column5: Out fishing today & my foot paddle quit working cable seems to be attached to the base in the foot paddle, when I moved it with my hand it seemed attached put the motor doesn't pivot, any ideas if this can be fixed, no resistance on the paddle at all & were does everybody get there service work done Thanx for any & all Help Richard
I think Brian Berriault at Backwater Tackle in Midland does work on them.
I have replace two cables on my Minn Kota's over the years....take it apart and find the problem. Probably just a broken cable.
